Functions

fenteAscendante

  • fenteAscendante(heirs: Heir[]): Heir[] | AwareOfBranch[]
    • Defined in src/core/devolution/useCases/correctifs/fente/fente.ts:17

    If the ascendants in the paternal and maternal lines are in the same degree, the property is divided into two equal shares, one of which goes to the ascendants on the paternal side, and the other to the ascendants on the maternal side, whether the number of ascendants on each side be equal or not.

    Parameters

    • heirs: Heir[]

    Returns Heir[] | AwareOfBranch[]
